Trade/Device Name(s): FastPack® Vitamin D Method Verification Kit
Methodologies: Direct competitive chemiluminescence immunoassay employing paramagnetic particles
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FastPack Vitamin D Immunoassay and associated calibrator, control, and method verification kits for quantitative measurement of vitamin D metabolites in human serum and plasma using chemiluminescence on the FastPack Analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative determination of total 25-hydroxyvitamin D and other hydroxylated metabolites in human serum and plasma to aid assessment of vitamin D sufficiency in adults; calibrator, control, and method verification kits are used for calibration, quality control, and range verification of the FastPack Vitamin D Immunoassay on the FastPack Analyzer.
